cleaned_text: Reiki Salt Lake City Utah. During Reiki, the practitioner directs healing energy to the subtle, or energetic, body, which is directly related to the mind and nervous system. A Reiki, session works with seven points along the spine, called "chakras", as well as specific points on the arms and legs, We hold emotions, memories, thoughts, and even past life experiences in our subtle, or energetic, body. Reiki, assists in releasing stuck stress, letting go of emotional "baggage", and brings clearing, light energy to the body, mind, and spirit. This unique practice involves light or no touch and is ideal for anyone, in any physical condition. Most clients leave feeling more like "themselves", with improved sleep, less worry and anxiety, and a general feeling of peace and calm. Many are able to move forward in certain areas of their lives in which they might have felt "stuck". Consultation about how to practice clearing your own energy through meditation and visualization practices may also be included for self-empowerment and daily energetic practices.
